description:
This course will teach you the basic of Facebook Insights and show you how to use them for business. Facebook provides a lot of data and information, but very few people know how to use this to their advantage. You will know how to figure out when the majority of fans are online, what posts get the most engagement, and the number of people who see your page.

There is also added bonus content to help take your Facebook presence to the next level.
title: The Basics of Facebook Analytics
